meanings: 음식 (중식) Noodles in Thick Broth (로마자표기: ulmyeon)
(사람이) cry (over/about), weep, (큰 소리로) howl, bawl, wail
(속담) It goes ill with the house where the hen sings and the cock is silent. or It is a sad house where the hen crows louder than the cock.
A crying baby will be breastfed

meanings.meaning: When the heavens weep, the earth shall live.
If it squeals let it go

vlive.korean: [울면 안대] 안대~ [Don't cry] No~ 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.26 SSS #2 (SVT SECRET SANTA #2)
내가 여기서 갑자기 울면 이상한 거지? It'll get really awkward if I cry here? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [IU] 띄어쓰기없이보낼게올때징로나,,🍈🍦(IU’s concert episode with Yoo In na)
vlive.english: It'll get really awkward if I cry here?

vlive.korean: 나도 갑자기... - 지금 다 울면 너도 울어? Suddenly... - If we cry now, will you cry? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] THE BOYZ X LieV - 더보이즈의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Suddenly... - If we cry now, will you cry?

vlive.korean: 그리고 - 제가 울면... 나 우는 거 본 적 있지 않나? And... - If I cry... Haven't you seen me cry? 듣기 View video SF9 : 안녕하세요잠깐할거구요전다원인데요재윤이형은금방간데요다른멤버X^^
vlive.english: And... - If I cry... Haven't you seen me cry?

vlive.korean: 항상 웃게만 만들 거라 울면 안 돼요 울지 마요! I am always going to make you smile. Don't cry!! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Kei X Rooftop Live - 케이의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: I am always going to make you smile. Don't cry!!

examples.korean: At first cock-crow the ghosts must go Back to their quiet graves below. (Theodosia Garrison) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 첫 닭이 울면 유령은 그들의 조용한 지하 무덤으로 돌아가야 한다. (테오도시아 개리슨, 용기명언) 명언/속담
